Carnegie Mellon University (M.S.)

Program: Master of Science in Computer Science

This is the most flexible Master program in Computer Science Department, with the lowest acceptance rate (<4%). We construct our own courses of study. My main focus during this program is system, AI and theory.

Peking University (B.S.)

I guraduated with Bachelor of Science in Computer Science major, SUMMA CUM LAUDE. My undergraduate education is a combination of academic education and research. My overall GPA is 88/100 and my major GPA is 92/100. My class rank was 4/52. My undergraduate research focus was programming languages and software testing. I was part of the top-notch plan (<10% acceptance rate).

Early

I was graduated at No.2 high school attached to eastern china university. During my early academic education, I was strong at Math, Physics, English, Essay writing and Information Technology. My weakest subjects are History and Biology.

I was part of training camp for Mathematics Olympics. I got first prize in Chinese Mathmatics League and got admitted to Peking University, exempted from college entrance exam.
